actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to extend until December 31, 1994, the deadline for the State of Pennsylvania to submit certain provisions of a Clean Air Act implementation plan applicable to the Liberty Borough PM-10 Nonattainment Area, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the deadline for implementation plan submissions for particulate matter-10 (PM-10) under the Clean Air Act until December 31, 1994, with respect to the Liberty Borough Nonattainment Area in western Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to extend until December 31, 1994, the deadline for the State of Pennsylvania to submit certain provisions of a Clean Air Act implementation plan applicable to the Liberty Borough PM-10 Nonattainment Area, and for other purposes.
